Headline: #95 95th and #30 South Chicago Temporary Reroute near 92nd/Exchange
ShortDescription: 95 95th and 30 South Chicago buses temporarily rerouted due to, street blockage near 92nd/Exchange.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

#95 95th and #30 South Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 92nd/Exchange, due to street blockage near 92nd/Exchange.

#95 95th buses will operate via 93rd, South Chicago, Commercial, 92nd and over regular route .

#30 South Chicago buses will operate via South Chicago, 91st, Commercial, 92nd and over regular route.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Green Line Delays, Limited Service Between Garfield & Cottage Grove
ShortDescription: Green Line service experiencing delays; no service via train between Cottage Grove & Garfield.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line trains are experiencing delays due to a loss of power near the area of 59th. We are working to run as much service as frequently and as evenly as possible.

Currently, ALL Green Line trains are operating in as follows:

  • between Harlem/Lake and Ashland/63rd in both directions, and,
  •  and shuttle buses will provide connecting service between Garfield station and Cottage Grove, in both directions.

Change trains at Garfield for continuing service between the East 63rd branch and trains running the remainder of the Green Line route between Harlem/Lake, downtown and Ashland/63rd.

See station personnel for further assistance and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
